mapper.sql: id, name, credentials_type, credentials_number, email, phone, total_amount, order_amount, base_amount, service_amount, other_amount, coupon_id, description, discount, deposit, return_deposit, is_deposit_returned, package_name, get_store_id, return_store_id, start_date, return_date, real_return_date, pay_time, status, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, car_item_id
mapper.select: select car_Id from tnc_car_item where id = #{xxx}
select brand_id from tnc_car where id = #{xxx}

select
from tnc_order
AND ( is_deleted = 0 )
AND ( status = #{search} )
order by gmt_create DESC

select * from tnc_order a join tnc_car_item b on a.car_item_id = b.id join tnc_store getstore on a.get_store_id = getstore.id join tnc_address getadd on getstore.addr_id = getadd.id join tnc_store returnstore on a.return_store_id = returnstore.id join tnc_address returnadd on returnstore.addr_id = returnadd.id join tnc_car c on b.car_id = c.id join tnc_brand d on c.brand_id = d.id
a.is_deleted = 0
AND ( b.number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR c.series LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR getstore.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR returnstore.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR d.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND ( getadd.province_id = #{gp}) AND ( getadd.city_id = #{gc}) AND ( getadd.area_id = #{ga}) AND ( returnadd.province_id = #{bp}) AND ( returnadd.city_id = #{bc}) AND ( returnadd.area_id = #{ba})
and a.return_date >= #{now}
AND ( a.status = #{status} )
order by a.gmt_create DESC
select number from tnc_car_item where car_id = #{xxx} and status = 0 and is_deleted = 0

select * from tnc_order
AND ( is_deleted = 0 )
AND ( status = #{search} )

select * from tnc_order a join tnc_car_item b on a.car_item_id = b.id join tnc_store getstore on a.get_store_id = getstore.id join tnc_store returnstore on a.return_store_id = returnstore.id join tnc_car c on b.car_id = c.id join tnc_brand d on c.brand_id = d.id
a.is_deleted = 0
AND ( b.number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR c.series LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR getstore.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR returnstore.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR d.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND ( a.status = #{status} )

select store.name `name`, pr.name `province`, cr.name `city`, ar.name `area`, a.detail `detail` from tnc_store store join tnc_address a on store.addr_id = a.id join address_region pr on a.province_id = pr.id join address_region cr on a.city_id = cr.id join address_region ar on a.area_id = ar.id where store.id = #{xxx}
select a.number as nub, b.series as series, b.id as carId, d.name as brand from tnc_car_item as a, tnc_car as b, tnc_brand as d where a.id = #{xxx} and a.car_id = b.id and b.brand_id = d.id
mapper.insert: insert into tnc_order (id, name, credentials_type, credentials_number, email, phone, total_amount, order_amount, base_amount, service_amount, other_amount, coupon_id, description, discount, deposit, return_deposit, is_deposit_returned, package_name, get_store_id, return_store_id, start_date, return_date, real_return_date, pay_time, status, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, car_item_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{credentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otherAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDepositReturned,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{returnStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realReturnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update tnc_order
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credentials_type = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
credentials_number = #{credentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
base_amount = #{baseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
service_amount = #{serviceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
other_amount = #{otherAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
return_deposit = #{returnDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_deposit_returned = #{isDepositReturned,jdbcType=TINYINT},
package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
get_store_id = #{getStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
return_store_id = #{returnStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
return_date = #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
real_return_date = #{realReturnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
car_item_id = #{carItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tnc_order set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credentials_type = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, credentials_number = #{credentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, base_amount = #{baseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, service_amount = #{serviceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, other_amount = #{otherAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, return_deposit = #{returnDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_deposit_returned = #{isDepositReturned,jdbcType=TINYINT}, package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_store_id = #{getStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, return_store_id = #{returnStoreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, return_date = #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, real_return_date = #{realReturnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_item_id = #{carItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
